lead_paragraph: Todd Boeckman will start at quarterback when No. 11 Ohio State plays host to Youngstown State on Saturday in its season opener.Boeckman takes over for Troy Smith, who won the Heisman Trophy last season.The 6-foot-5, 235-pound Boeckman was listed No. 1 on the depth chart coming into spring practice, then solidified his position this summer over Rob Schoenhoft, Antonio Henton and Joe Bauserman.
